document_name: Decree-law 76/2019 on the legal regime applicable to electricity activities
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/PRT/2019/PRT-2019-03-06-Decree-law 76_2019 on the legal regime applicable to electricity activities_1dfecce82b062dedbfdf91a065889f25.pdf
document_description: This document makes the fifth amendment to the Statutes of the Energy Services Regulatory Authority set out in Decree-Law no. 172/2006. It establishes the legal regime applicable to the activities of generation, storage, transport, distribution and trading of electricity and related activities. It defines the regulatory framework on self-generation of energy and to increase the share of renewable sources in the overall energy mix.
